normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You Might Miss Out on a Saree (and Other Cool Stuff!)

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Ever felt that rush when you stumble upon a crazy good deal? That's the magic of flash sales! In the world of retail and e-commerce, they're like unexpected sprinkles on your jalebi – a sweet surprise that makes everything better.
normalised: Hey everyone! Ever felt that rush when you stumble upon a crazy good deal? That's the magic of flash sales! In the world of retail and e-commerce, they're like unexpected sprinkles on your jalebi – a sweet surprise that makes everything better.

unnormalised: Think about it: you're scrolling through Myntra, maybe looking for a nice kurta for Diwali or a trendy new pair of shoes, and BOOM! A banner screams "FLASH SALE! 70% OFF for the next 4 hours!" Suddenly, your heart races a little. That lehenga you've been eyeing is suddenly within budget! It’s like finding Rs. 500 in your old jeans pocket – pure, unadulterated joy.

unnormalised: For retailers, flash sales are a fantastic way to clear out old inventory, boost sales figures (especially crucial before the end of the financial year!), and attract new customers. Imagine a small business in Chandni Chowk using a flash sale to get rid of last season's fabrics. Smart, right? They create a sense of urgency, making customers more likely to make impulsive purchases. Remember that time I bought 3 kilos of mangoes because they were on sale? No regrets!

unnormalised: But as a savvy shopper, you've gotta be quick and smart. First, know what you’re looking for. Don't get distracted by every shiny thing! Second, compare prices. Sometimes, a "flash sale" isn't actually the best deal. Third, check the shipping costs! A great discount on a silk saree from Kanjeevaram is no good if the shipping to Mumbai adds another Rs. 800.

unnormalised: And finally, remember this: sometimes the best deals are the ones you *don't* take. Don’t buy something just because it’s cheap! Save your money for that delicious biryani at Paradise in Hyderabad.
